comment: (2011 Fall semester). For his first time teaching a design foundation class, I feel he was an excellent Professor. His only problem was lacking the ability to motivate students, as he is used to upper level students who have a stronger worth ethic. Lots of knowledge, great fun, and willing to help if asked. Must be able to manage your own time.

Professor Cole is an awesome teacher. He makes you think about what you need to do for the projects but helps and will tell you this is what he likes as an idea...but tough during reviews..got a C in the class but learned so much from him take him if you wanna learn more.
Brilliant and always helpful! Very interested in your progress and hilarious as well

a wonderful, thought provoking professor who hangs on to his beaux arts training but teaches from the prospective that architecture is an ever changing world.  be ready to work and think on your own.  if you want you will learn alot.  his studio is based on what you produce and not how long it took you to produce it.

A very good prof. He's very laid back on requirements, but he knows when u can do more. I would not take him if u are lazy and just want a easy teacher. Only take him if you can work hard and motivate yourself. But by for the relazing studio u will every have
Excellent teacher who wants students to THINK
